front.title: INTERNET OSI INTEGRATION, COEXISTENCE AND INTEROPERABILITY ISSUES

abstract.t: The intent of this document is to provide technical descriptions of the issues involved in the integration of the Open Systems Interconnect (OSI) protocols into the operational networks which interconnect and comprise the ``Internet''. The issues raised and solutions discussed are a result of the Federal Networking Council (FNC) OSI Planning Group (FOPG). The members of the FOPG represent several Federal Government agencies such as the Department of Energy (DOE), the National Science Foundation (NSF) the National Aeronautics and Space Administration (NASA), the National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST) under the Department of Commerce, as well as University experts.
